department: RCMP National Forensic Laboratory Services, Edmonton, AB.
short_summary: GROUND WORK AND SNOW ELIMINATION COMPANIONAR BASED ON CONSTRUCTION AND AVAILABLE COMPETET
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) National Forensic Laboratory Services - Edmonton has a requirement for Grounds Maintenance and Snow Clearing Services for a twenty-four (24) month period, commencing April 1, 2023. This includes two (2) Grounds Maintenance Services Seasons from April 1st through to September 30th and two (2) Snow Clearing Seasons from October 1st through to March 31st, with the irrevocable option to extend for two (2) additional twelve (12) month periods.
